item.description:
Come join us this Saturday night at one of the newest dance venues in Boston - Mansion! This posh, two floor club has a stage, dance floor, upstairs lounge space, and great DJs. A great place to meet new people and to get your groove on! All members welcome, and feel free to bring a friend or two!

DETAILS: We will meet at 8pm in the first floor bar area of Troquet (140 Boylston St, next to the book store). Troquet is a French restaurant located at 140 Boylston St, next to Commonwealth Books, by Emerson College. We will head over to Mansion around 9:30-10pm to beat the lines. I hear the lines at Mansion can be difficult, so please meet us before 9:30pm, as you may not find us later. Expected cover: $15.

FIND THE ORGANIZER: My picture is located on the left-hand side of the site. For help/questions, my cell: 646.541.0708.

Mansion is an upscale venue, so please dress appropriately. If traveling by T, Troquet and Mansion are located between Arlington and Boylston T stops on the green line.

See you there! Charlie

group.name: The Boston Night Life Meetup Group

item.name: Put on Your Dancing Shoes - Mansion, This Saturday Night!
